Source code for vizasm.hopper.HopperLoggingHandler

'''
VizAsm

Created on 23.10.2013

@author: Nils Schmidt

import logging


[docs]class HopperLoggingHandler(logging.StreamHandler):
    '''Logging handler for Hopper. Redirects the output to the log function of `Document`
   
    Parameters
    ----------
    doc: Document (see Hopper api)
    '''

    def __init__(self, stream = None, doc = None):
        logging.StreamHandler.__init__(self, stream)
        self.__doc = doc


[docs]    def get_doc(self):
        return self.__doc



[docs]    def set_doc(self, value):
        self.__doc = value
        


[docs]    def emit(self, record):
        try:
            msg = self.format(record)
            fs = "%s"
            self.doc.log(fs % msg)
        except (KeyboardInterrupt, SystemExit):
            raise
        except:
            self.handleError(record)


    doc = property(get_doc, set_doc, None, "doc(Document) -- (see Hopper api)")
